headline: Enphase: Face The Harsh Reality Of President Trump's Tax Bill Than Continue Waiting
summary: Enphase faces major headwinds from policy risks, weak growth, and intense competition, with shares down nearly 90% from 2022 highs. Read why ENPH stock is a hold.
